name: Cavevania
description:
a small metroidvania with a bit of sandbox made for the "Genre Mash Jam"

the game is missing a lot of stuff because i over scoped the game unfortunately :(

Controls:

  • Move = WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Jump = W/Up/Space/Z
  • Attack = X/Shift
  • Mine = Q/C

Resources used
Most of the sound effects are from the wowie resource pack : https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

Sunny land art pack : https://ansimuz.itch.io/sunny-land-pixel-game-art

The player character : https://lil-cthulhu.itch.io/animated-pixel-charackter
